main event: On September 20, 1958, a UFO sighting was reported near Andrews AFB, Washington DC, with military personnel investigating the situation.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a glowing orange round object, its size estimated to be about one and a half times larger than the moon., The object emitted a humming sound resembling wind rushing., Witnesses reported sparks shooting from the rear of the object as it descended., Initial tension was high among observers, but it lessened after further observations., Investigation revealed the object was initially mistaken for a potential threat but turned out to be reflected light from nearby arc welders working on power lines.
witness description: Military personnel and Andrews AFB tower operators
